Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose between two different level layouts for Act 1.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Choose between two different options for placing Act 1's hidden medals and media collectibles.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Choose whether to enable/disable the mod's tweaked rank table.
Sets a custom made layout of Act 1 and the latter half of the October 14, 2008 prototype build stitched together.
Sets the layout that was used in the October 14, 2008 prototype build without any other adjustments.
Places the level's medals and media collectibles in their normal locations from Act 1.
This means that all items will be contained in the first half of the level at their known spots.
Places the level's medals and media collectibles in locations used in the October 14, 2008 prototype build.
This means that all items will be spread across the entire level at different spots.
Increases both Act 1 and 1-2's time bonus and rank requirements to scale for the longer length of both.
Sets Act 1 and 1-2's time bonus and rank requirements to Act 1's values.
